title: Roblox, Intuit, Farfetch, Lucid: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Intuit lifted its financial forecast; Farfetch shares plunged after it missed sales expectations
body:
Futures are wavering on renewed anxiety around rising Covid-19 infections and related restrictions in Europe. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
